BasicDetails.Description: Property has been entered into a private luxury auction. Showings will only be allowed during the prescheduled open house viewing days and times. For more information, including buyer and selling agent obligations, please contact PRUSA at 516.280.8280 or go to PRUSA.com for information. OLD WESTBURY. Ensconced on 4 idyllic acres of gorgeous manicured lawns, exquisite gardens and mature trees, this spectacular, over 7,000-square-foot contemporary has been masterfully designed for those who love all things beautiful both in nature and in manmade aesthetics. Approached by a circular drive, dramatic white granite steps and a stunning cedar and glass façade are but a mere introduction to the stunning and masterful use of high-end materials seen throughout the manse as well as the breathtaking outdoor entertainment complex. This summer haven includes a myriad of decks and granite patios leading to an immense inground Gunite pool and spa, cabana, and tennis court, all accented by delightful specimen plantings with a lush backdrop of foliage. The interior is equally enthralling and amenable to entertaining beginning with its 2-story foyer and living room, awash with sunlight through walls of glass and huge clerestories. From here, the floor plan flows easily into an exceptional formal dining room with 2 solid walls of glass; a cozy den with unique stainless steel entertainment center and fireplace; a cherry and granite wet bar; and the extraordinary gourmet kitchen. This cook's delight features sleek cherry and granite cabinetry, a huge center island, and a solid picture window above the sink and counter overlooking the pool. High-end appliances galore serve every desire. Sliding-glass doors in the breakfast area open to the expansive patio, ideal for al fresco dining. In a wing of its own with a spacious deck overlooking the pool, the palatial master suite boasts a huge bedroom with make-up alcove, 2 fabulous custom 4-season closets, and a lavish marble bath with twin vanity, shower, water closet and Roman whirlpool tub beneath a picture window. Two additional bedrooms with baths en suite, a stunning powder room, and laundry complete this level. On the second floor a dramatic balcony with cascading wall of glass overlooks the living room and leads to 2 additional bedrooms with baths en suite. One could easily serve as a second master suite with its own balcony and ample room throughout. The finished lower level boasts an entertainment room with media area and movie screen plus a cedar closet. Located in Old Westbury, with its gently rolling hillsides dotted with magnificent estates, this entertainers gem is convenient to golf, polo, 3 major universities, equestrian facilities, and is just a short drive from boating, museums, dining and premier shopping. It is approximately ½ -hour commute to Manhattan by car or train.

Welcome to Williamsburg's most desirable condo buildings to live in Olive Park! Brand new to market! This C line unit is located on one of the highest floors in this building with a total square footage of roughly 1188 and it comes with your own deeded indoor garage parking spot too! It has an interior of 1013 square feet making this the largest 2 bed/2 bath in this building with an additional 175 square foot private corner balcony that faces both north & east. Since this is a corner unit you get multiple scenic views! On the northern side you can see a full view of the Manhattan skyline and from the eastern side you can see beautiful Cooper park- so you have the best of both views! It is very rare to see a unit on the C line go on the market in this building! Olive Park's luxury 5 star resort amenities includes an indoor heated all natural salt water swimming pool, spa, Jacuzzi, sauna and much more! It's located right across the street from newly renovated Cooper Park that includes a dog run, running track, children's playground, adult exercise stations, tennis, handball, volleyball & basketball courts, skateboard area, exercise classes by donation and an organic farmer's market during the spring & summer months. Interior features: master bedroom comes with it's own California custom build walk in closet (this is an added feature), 9 foot tall high ceilings, oak hardwood floors, marble bathroom & kitchen, state of the line Bosch stove, microwave & refrigerator, rainforest shower & huge soak in tub, build in dishwasher with a optional washer/dryer combo unit. With a total of 14 California windows you get excellent quality air & light in this unit. These two elements are essential for good feng shui energy in your home. Exterior features: 24 hour doorman security & concierge, indoor heated swimming pool, spa, Jacuzzi, sauna, state of the line gym, welcoming guest reception area that includes comfy couches, fireplace & pool table, common laundry room, private deeded storage unit, common cold storage for groceries, recreational room that you can privately reserve to host gatherings in, common roof top cabana with Manhattan Skyline views and a relaxing mediation garden with reflecting pond & bbq. To top it off this building has a pet spa so dogs and cats are welcome! Community features: a very highly rated Montessori pre-K school and for a fee weekly baby swimming & music classes. Neighborhood features: L train is 2 blocks away from Graham Ave or take the G train which is a short 10 minute walk to the Lorimer Street station, short 10 minute bus ride to the J, M,Z trains and close to award winning restaurants, coffee/bakery shops & grocery stores. Brooklyn Steel a new concert venue that is close by for you music lovers too. RE taxes are currently only $44.00 a month that has a tax abatement with an estimated 16 years left! There's a 2017 assessment in place that the seller will pay at closing so no need to worry about paying any additional costs on top of your monthly hoa fees when buying into this building! Some amazing optional add ons: purchasing a private rooftop cabana with a Manhattan Skyline or a beautiful Park view. Note: Indoor parking spot that comes with this unit is optional. Please reach out to Sandy Abbas for a private viewing today!

This beautifully renovated apartment at The Gramercy Arms showcases the best prewar details and offers the highest quality upgrades. The home begins with a 20 foot gallery hallway, perfect for large format artwork, and also features a hall closet for storage. This leads to the living room with high beamed ceilings, skim coated walls, and double sash divided light windows facing peaceful East 22nd Street. The fully renovated windowed kitchen is a favorite room in the home with a Bertazzoni range, Bosch dishwasher, Liebherr refrigerator, Ceasarstone countertops, custom solid wood cabinetry, and glass tile backsplash. The generous bedroom is quiet and comfortable with custom California closet and access just past the linen closet to the windowed ceramic tile bathroom. The home was renovated just three years ago and has been lovingly cared for by the same owner for over two decades. The Gramercy Arms is located on East 22nd Street just off of Park Avenue at the intersection of the Gramercy Park and Flatiron neighborhoods. The building features original Art Deco details, terracotta panels, a restored illuminated steel marquis, decorative carved glass block, steel radiator enclosures, terrazzo floors, and an updated entry with new canopy and ramp. Amenities in the building include a live in super, elevator, laundry room, and building storage. The 6, R, and W trains are just one block from the front door and Novita, Mailino, ABC Kitchen, Gramercy Tavern, Cosme, Craft and some of the city's best shopping and nightlife are all just steps away.

Upon entering the grand lobby of this storied pre-war coop located at 105 East 38th Street, you'll find yourself four short floors off the elevator to unit 4A, a recently renovated, quiet, spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom flooded with natural light, an open floor plan perfect for entertaining family and friends, and a spacious bedroom which easily fits a king-size bed facing east with air and light for days. Ample closet space in the bedroom and foyer, as well as custom built-ins in the bedroom for additional hanging and folding space makes this unit perfect for those with a need for storage space. Located steps from storied Park Avenue, 105 E 38th Street in Murray Hill is a boutique pre-war cooperative built in 1924 consisting of 27 units which is minutes away from Grand Central Station, perfect for reverse commuters, or those who regularly rely on public transportation. This building also has two public spaces available to all shareholders: a ground floor public outdoor space perfect for reading a book while your laundry is finishing up in the newly updated Hercules washer/dryers. Also available to shareholders is a common roof deck with beautiful 180 degree views. Enjoy this unit's low monthly maintenance, which averages about $300 less per month than other similar buildings in the area. Gifting, co-purchasing and pied-a-terres are all welcome, and pets are considered by the board on a case-by-case basis.

The large outdoor area is a true urban Zen oasis. It includes gorgeous Brazilian hardwood fencing, an outdoor cooking area with an integrated Bull grill and a swing. The space is ideal for entertaining.

This spacious, modern 2 bedrooms, 2 bath DUMBO condominium with a private balcony and parking space is less than 10 steps from the Brooklyn waterfront and East River Ferry. Enjoy luxury condo living in a landmarked building near all the amenities in sought-after DUMBO/Vinegar Hill & Brooklyn Heights. Apartments of this size, in this location with private parking are rare to begin with, and then factor in the extremely LOW monthly running costs making this apartment extremely desirable and not likely to be on the market long. Pull your car into your own spot in the building's private garage. Enter into a gracious foyer, introducing 4" wide white oak hardwood floors that flow throughout. Down the hall are a convenient coat closet, laundry room and the first full bath. Proceed to the stylish chef's kitchen for culinary inspiration, adorned with honed matte granite countertops, an island with seating, custom Italian glass backsplash, and high-end stainless steel appliances including a Thermador refrigerator, 6-burner gas range, Bosch dishwasher, and wine fridge. Plentiful wood cabinetry and a full pantry provides tremendous storage, the bright, airy layout continues into the open living/dining room, perfect for relaxing & entertaining. Both sunny bedrooms feature oversized windows & California closets, with a walk-in by the master. Your elegant master bath has Carrera marble floors, floor-to-ceiling subway tile shower with Carrera marble inlays & glass enclosure, plus high-end fixtures. Set on the waterfront once known as Warehouse Way, 4 Water Street represents a valuable piece of Brooklyn history on the site of warehouses which made the borough a landfall, loading zone & storage space for cargo. As NYC's docks grew increasingly crowded, the ample Brooklyn commercial waterfront thrived, housing tobacco, sugar, coffee, molasses, wool, palm oil, rubber, fruits & other goods from around the world. Now a desirable boutique residence, the landmarked, pet-friendly 4 Water Street sits in the center of it all, with every attraction outside your door such as the famed River Cafe, exclusive Soho House, Grimaldi's Pizza (Brooklyn's best!), Just opened Cecconi's, Juliana's, Shake Shack & tons of eateries, gourmet markets, and stunning Brooklyn Bridge Park which is brimming with activity, from events & concerts to sports fields & exercise classes. Kitchens are outfitted with custom cabinetry, Caesarstone countertop and stone backsplash, stainless steel GE appliances, and integrated dishwashers and microwaves. Bathrooms are appointed with white quartz stone wall panels, polished chrome Grohe and Duravit fixtures, custom walnut medicine cabinetry, and wall hung Toto toilets.The robust amenity offering at 461 Dean Street is comprised of a sky lounge and rooftop terrace, state of the art fitness center, yoga, and dance studio, residents lounge with a catering kitchen and dedicated party room, a game room with billiards and ping-pong, and a children's playroom.At the nexus of Brooklyn's most vibrant neighborhoods is Pacific Park Brooklyn. With beautiful residences designed by industry leading architects, a brand new 8-acre park, Barclays Center and dynamic neighborhood shopping and dining right in your backyard, Pacific Park has something for everyone, just steps from the 2, 3, 4, 5, B, D, N, Q, R, C, G, trains.2 Months Free and 1 Month OP on 14 Month Lease for 1 Bedrooms1 Month Free and 1 Month OP on 13 Month Lease for Studios

Looking for a gorgeous, pin drop quiet, high floor studio all in a full service building? If so, this bright and sunny apartment could be your next home. Enjoy western exposures with an outstanding open-city view, ample closet space and a spacious dining alcove.460 East 79th Street is a full service building with full-time lobby attendance, live-in super, bicycle storage, central laundry room and parking garage (parking space not included). Enjoy all the shops and restaurants that Yorkville has to offer, as well as nearby Carl Schurz Park. Close to crosstown bus, 2nd Avenue Subway. Pets allowed.

Location.StreetIntersection: Bet N Basin Rd and 46th Ave

BasicDetails.Description:
**MINT CONDITION, NO FEE 2BR/2BA IN LIC'S PREMIER LUXURY TOWER**

Now available is a beautifully laid out 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom home on LIC's waterfront with stunning views from every room. Available immediately for a 1-2 year lease option.

This split bedroom apartment features an open spacious layout, condo-like finishes, oversized windows, oak wood floors, entry foyer with large coat closet, a modern kitchen with black caesarstone countertops, white lacquer cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, W/D in unit, ample closet space throughout, and South/West exposure with direct views of the Manhattan skyline. You will love the Master Bedroom which has large windows flooding the room with warm natural light and offer dual exposure East and South, 2 large closets, and a en-suite Master Bath with great storage space.

This full service luxury amenity towers is LEED-certified, pet friendly, and provides residents with the best amenities in the area. You'll have access to an amenity package consisting of 24-hour concierge, a package room, valet service, children's playroom, a high-tech fitness center, yoga room, a 50,000 square foot landscaped sun deck which includes a 2ft reflecting pool, BBQ & lounge area, beach volleyball court, 2 tennis courts, a great lawn, children's playground, a 1000-car parking garage, and retail on the ground floor. All of this located within steps from Gantry Plaza State Park. There are 3 dog parks in the area, brand new schools, 4 play grounds, and a variety of restaurants to choose from. Only 1 stop (and 5 min) on the 7 train from Grand Central. Building provides a free shuttle service to the Vernon/Jackson Ave. station in case you don't feel like walking. Also within walking distance of the E,M, & G trains.

Please contact me to schedule a private showing of this apt. I am available 7 days a week. **Prospective tenants will be subject to an application review and credit check through TF Cornerstone. $100/person**

Beautiful renovated 1 bedroom apartment available in Sunnyside. This 1 bedroom apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a walkup building. Very bright apartment as there are windows in each room and its facing south. The kitchen includes a dishwasher and refinished cabinets.Conveniently located, one block from the 7 train, a few minutes away from 61st 7 Express stop and the LIRR. Starbucks, eateries and shops are all in close vicinity. Call now for a private viewing. Pet Friendly and Guarantors allowed. Heat & Hot water are included in the rent.

434 East 143rd Street is a recently renovated one bedroom home on the garden floor of this Mott Haven townhouse. Enjoy your own private entry, living on a townhouse block and the joys of living in this growing neighborhood. Visit us via the Brook Avenue subway station on the 6 line.

434 East 143rd Street is a recently renovated well-sized, two bedroom home with an impeccably renovated, windowed kitchen and open living space accented by a brick exposed wall on the parlor floor. Outside is a balcony and 700 sq ft of private, garden outdoor space. This home provides a half bath on the parlor floor and a beautifully designed, large, full bathroom on the upper floor. Its two bedrooms are perfectly proportioned for an equal share or for families. Enjoy your own private entry, living on a townhouse block and the joys of living in this growing Mott Haven neighborhood. Visit us via the Brook Avenue subway station on the 6 line. There is a $50 per month dog fee and $25 per month cat free if you have a dog or cat joining you to live at 434 East 143rd Street.

PENTHOUSE DUPLEX WITH PRIVATE OUTDOOR TERRACE!! This RARE One Bedroom Apartment has just been completely Gut Renovated with Top of the Line Finishes throughout. Enjoy this Pre War Charming True One Bedroom Loft Apartment with High Ceilings, an Open Kitchen, Full Size Appliances, New Marble Bathroom, Hardwood Floors, Large City Windows and Great Closet Space. Access to Private Roof Space off the bedroom. Located on a Beautiful Tree Lined Block in Prime Hell's Kitchen, Walking distance to Lincoln Center/Central Park/Chelsea and all Major Transportation. Available NOW , Pets Welcome.*PRICE IS NET EFFECTIVE OF 1 FREE MONTH,

SWEEPING, PANORAMIC ICONIC NYC SKYLINE VIEWS SOUTH & EAST . Exquisitely furnished one bedroom residence in the intimate, exclusive 400 Fifth Avenue Residences condominium that sits high above the five-star Langham Place Hotel. Floor-to-ceiling wrap around windows with full Empire State Building and Fifth Avenue views South towards the Freedom Tower, East River and top of the Chrysler Building. Sumptuous finishes including custom Poliform kitchen, Zuma soaking tub and Haisa marble flooring in ensuite bathroom, and black oak flooring throughout. Bose sound system. Electronic window shades. W/D in unit. Lavish services and amenities including Concierge, room service from Michelin-starred Ai Fiori, 24-hour fitness center, resident lounge floor with large outdoor terrace and billiard's room, and access to the full-service Chuan Body+Soul Spa. Perfectly situated in walking distance to the best of Midtown including Fifth Avenue shopping, Bryant Park and Time Square. Whole Foods close by and excellent transportation.

NO FEE. NET EFFECTIVE RENT LISTED, GUARANTOR ACCEPTED, IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY. Designed for avant-garde living, 363 Bond Street brings everything you've come to expect in a luxury Brooklyn apartment to a neighborhood that's refreshingly unexpected. Your space to dwell where local art and local tastes converge. Our luxury Brooklyn apartments are outfitted with your comfort in mind with custom Italian designed kitchen cabinetry, quartz countertops and islands, BOSCH stainless steel appliances including gas range cooking, wide plank hardwood floors, washer/dryer, and Nest thermostats. When the sun's up, relax poolside at the Brooklyn Crush Rooftop Pool with sundeck and mural by Tristan Eaton. Head to Social by 363, our resident lounge complete with bar, fireplace, billiards and tech room. Visit the Green by 363 and entertain at one of the private barbeque cabanas, or simply relax and lay in the grass at our rooftop lawn. Stay healthy at 363 FIT with Precore machines, PELOTON spin bikes and free weights spread across 4,000 SF and centered at the Yoga Studio by 363. Named Brooklyn's new hot spot by Conde Nast Traveler, Gowanus has a distinctly industrial character and is home to the city's most mouthwatering eateries, avant-garde galleries, and innovative businesses. Walk its streets and discover the city's best Italian coffee, rock climbing walls, co-working spots, and the only Whole Foods Market in Brooklyn. Here, you're steps away from the Park Slope R train and the Carroll Street F train, which gets you to Manhattan in under 10 minutes. This is the beating heart of Brooklyn's best new neighborhood

Here, you're steps away from the Park Slope R train and the Carroll Street F train, which gets you to Manhattan in under 10 minutes. This is the beating heart of Brooklyn's best new neighborhood

Conceived by Goldstein Hill and West Architects in tandem with renowned designer Mark Zeff, the residences at 365 Bond Street epitomize thoughtfully curated design, quality, and craftsmanship. The interior finishes accentuate the industrial casement-style windows overlooking the tranquil Gowanus Waterfront Park, tree-lined streets of Carroll Gardens, and the spectacular Manhattan skyline. Each residence features wide plank white oak hardwood floors, and Bosch washers and dryers. Kitchens include custom Italian kitchen cabinets with Quartz countertops and stainless steel Bosh appliances. Bathrooms are beautifully appointed with Kohler and Symmons fixtures.



365 Bond Street's all-inclusive suite of amenities, designed by landscape architect Weintraub Diaz and Mark Zeff, span an impressive 40,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor space.



With an abundance of outdoor space at 365 Bond, your urban oasis awaits. In addition to being surrounded by the new waterfront esplanade and park, 365 Bond provides a large scale interior garden courtyard, and a number of green rooftop terraces. 365 Bond offers the space and services for any occasion. Take a tranquil walk in the quiet interior courtyard; or gather with friends for a barbecue on the rooftop, while watching the sunset behind the Manhattan skyline. Maybe host a party in the game room or the gourmet kitchen and private dining room. Or just relax by the fireplace in the library.

The apartment also includes separate Electrolux washer/dryer units. 346 East 120th Street is a beautiful 10-unit, 5 story brownstone which has been completely renovated from the common areas to the beautifully designed apartments. 346 East 120th street also features a brand new video intercom system with fob entry access to residents. The building is in close proximity to Harlem staples like the Fine-Fare Supermarket, Patsy's Pizzeria, the Hunter College East Harlem Art Gallery, as well as the 4,5,6 train lines and the District 04 school zone.

Beautiful bright x.large one bedroom apartment with stunning high 9"4' ceilings.Totally brand new renovation with hardwood floors throughout.The windowed kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, granite counter top, lots of wood cabinetry, a dishwasher and large stainless steel LG refrigerator.The wonderful bright bedroom captures great light through its many windows. It is north facing onto a beautiful tree lined street and has excellent storage with a double closet with sliding doors and additional storage above. There is also another closet in the hallway.The sparkling windowed bathroom features gorgeous marble tiles and marble floor, bath/shower and a mirrored medicine cabinet with additional storage.Wonderfully located right by the Hudson river and just moments to the 1 train subway and cross town buses. Within 2 blocks you can find a chemist, Gristedes food market, Juice Generation, Starbucks, AMC theatre lots of restaurants and much more. Elevator, laundry in the basement and live -in super.

Spacious King size one bedroom Corner Unit available in a 24hr doorman building. Furnished 2 bedrooms with 2.5 bathrooms with Immediate occupancy. Beautiful city and river views. 10' floor-to-ceiling windows. Balcony overlooking East River. Expansive corner living/dining room.

Custom Italian glass and stainless-steel kitchen with Carrera Marble countertop and backsplash. 36 Sub-Zero refrigerator, Gaggenau cooktop, Thermador combination ovens, and a big picture window overlooking East River. 168 x 136 Master Suite with walk-in closet and spa master bathroom with Gioia Venetino marble, Tea for Two six-foot cast iron tub, double vanity with marble countertop, large full height frameless glass-enclosed shower.

Corner second bedroom with full wall of closets and en suite private bath with big picture window overlooking East River, Saint Florence marble, & custom Dado ceramic walls. Spacious windowed powder room. Vented full capacity washer and dryer.

Apartment Features: East exposure, North exposure, South exposure, and Terrace. Building features a full-time doorman and concierge, health club, private storage, valet, cable, and high-speed Internet.
Roslyn Country Club, beautiful 3bedroom 2 full bath living room with fire place eat in kitchen, new carpet fresh paint ,new dish washer, close To allAll are welcome.

This bright and spacious studio, located in the most desired area in the Upper East Side, is the perfect entry-level apartment or pied-a-terre. Just moments from the new N/Q/R and F train, The Paladin Condominium is an elevator building with a 24 hour doorman, laundry room, bike room as well as a storage room. Integrating the highest quality design with innovative architecture and sophisticated elegance, the residences at Aurora surpass the expectations of even the most discerning tastes.

Floor-to-ceiling windows frame impressive views of the city skyline and illuminate brilliant natural light throughout every room. Clean lines, white oak flooring and light, modern finishes unify both use and design.

Aurora's fluid living, kitchen and dining spaces are emphasized by white lacquer cabinetry, pure white quartz countertops, and a full height backsplash. Seamlessly paneled appliances featuring a Leibherr refrigerator, five-burner Bertazzoni range, and Bosch dishwasher set a new standard for rental residences in LIC.

Bathrooms offer premium Grohe and Toto fixtures with recessed lighting, and pure white quart stone and lacquer vanities. Select units feature glass enclosed showers.

An exclusive full-floor rooftop amenity space defined by soaring eighteen-foot full-height glass curtain walls. Aurora Sky Lounge is a continuation of the buildings modern architecture, featuring plush seating, high-definition television, Wi-Fi access, entertaining kitchenette, and a live edge dining table with seating for 10. The space extends out to Auroras Sky Deck, a beautifully landscaped, roof-top sun terrace complete with an outdoor grilling station, misting shower, chaise lounges, and intimate seating. This dramatic setting is perfect to take in the spectacular river and skyline views while relaxing or entertaining. Aurora Sky Fitness is a state-of-the-art fitness center offering free weights, high-tech cardio and strength training equipment from Life Fitness.

Additional amenities include: 24-hour attended lobby, bicycle and personal storage, laundry facilities, valet service, a package room, and on-site parking.

*Gross rent is $3,150

This charming newly renovated apartment is located in the heart of East Williamsburg, Brooklyn (Leonard St. and Devoe St.) - Near all the action and transportation. Newly renovated full bathroom with an amazing soak tub, and granite floors that compliments the natural / modern lighting. The kitchen has also been renovated with oversized large kitchen cabinets, new range, refrigerator and dishwasher. The apartment features 2 box rooms which can be used as a share- meaning 2 bedrooms or can be used as a one bedroom with a living room.. (size of each box room is approximately 12'x14" and 13'x15') The owners decided to preserve the original hardwood floors throughout the apt to keep that authentic look you can expect from a 1930's Williamsburg apt. All original!! Utilities: Free heating and water. You pay for only your own cooking gas and electricity. Entertainment & Transportation: Just minutes away from all the energy and excitement Williamsburg has to offer. Short distance to shopping, Bedford Avenue, Bars, nightlife and dining -- (Bamonte's, Fette Sau, St. Anselm, Fortunato Brothers, The Commodore, Samurai Mama, Lilia Italian - just to name a few), McCarren Park, and East River State Park. Only one block from the L line Lorimer Street subway station. (5 minutes to 14th st/1st Ave Manhattan), NYC Beach Bus and public buses on Metropolitan and Grand Avenue. Availability: Immediate occupancy. Security deposit, first month and realtor fee, plus professional third party credit check $30., only if your credit report is past 3 months. BasicDetails.Description: Beautiful elegant marble floor entrance way and waiting area. Warm, friendly staff to greet you. Stunning chandeliers adorn the foyer and mirrored elevator hallway with charming crown moldings. Excellent location. The Whitehall is by the 1,2, 3 trains and crosstown buses. Within 10 minutes you are in Times square on the express 2,3 train. Perfect location for travelling downtown and across town. Columbia University, Hudson River, Central Park, Riverside Park, Wholefoods, Westside market and almost every type of cuisine within blocks. The bright studio boasts great storage with 2 closets, crown moldings and city views. The renovated kitchen showcases stainless steel appliances, plentiful cabinetry, and a microwave. The Whitehall features 24 hour doormen, great security, complimentary common storage, laundry in the building, stunning sun deck complete with city views, bbqs and outdoor furniture for those hot summer nights. UTILITIES INCLUDED (hot water, heat, gas & electricity)!

Integrating the highest quality design with innovative architecture and sophisticated elegance, the residences at 1 QPS surpass the expectations of even the most discerning tastes.

Floor-to-ceiling windows frame impressive views of the city skyline and illuminate brilliant natural light throughout every room. Clean lines, white oak flooring and light, modern finishes unify both use and design.

1 QPS Tower's fluid living, kitchen, and dining spaces are emphasized by beautiful cabinetry, white quartz countertops, and a full height backsplash. Each apartment has washers and dryers. 1 QPS Tower has set a new standard for rental residences in LIC.

Each bathroom offers premium Duravit deep bathtubs with recessed lighting, and pure white quartz stone vanities.

An exclusive full-floor rooftop pool with BBQ's.

1 QPS Tower's lounge is a continuation of the building's modern architecture, featuring plush seating, high-definition television, Wi-Fi access, a pool table, and an entertaining kitchenette.

1 QPS Tower's fitness is a state-of-the-art fitness center offering a rock climbing wall, free weights, high-tech cardio and strength training equipment.

Additional amenities include: 24-hour attended lobby, bicycle, laundry facilities, valet service, a package room, and on-site parking.

Situated directly along the Hudson River, in the prime northwest corner of Battery Park City, the newly constructed, and widely celebrated, River & Warren condominium is at the forefront of desired downtown living. The master bedroom features an oversized walk-in by California Closets, home office nook, and dramatic en-suite bath appointed with Bianco Puro marble walls and chevron patterned floor, white oak double vanity with polished nickel detail, and stone inlaid shelves along both the oversized soaking tub and enclosed glass shower.Luxury services and amenities include 24- door attendant and concierge, fitness center and heated yoga studio, nautical children's playroom, and landscaped rooftop terrace with outdoor kitchens. Additional storage available for purchase and separate parking garage just around the corner. The perfectly positioned location between Rockefeller and Teardrop Parks on Warren Street, which connects with the vibrant neighborhood of Tribeca, provides access to immense green space, and is just a short walk to high-end shops at Brookfield Place, Whole Foods, Soul Cycle, plus so much more.
